wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Hi, this is a comment. To get started with moderating, editing, and deleting comments, please visit the Comments screen in the dashboard. Commenter avatars come from Gravatar.

item.title: Checkout

item.content:encoded: [woocommerce_checkout]

item.title: Refund and Returns Policy
item.dc:creator: Riel1240
item.content:encoded:
This is a sample page.

Overview

Our refund and returns policy lasts 30 days. If 30 days have passed since your purchase, we cant offer you a full refund or exchange.

To be eligible for a return, your item must be unused and in the same condition that you received it. It must also be in the original packaging.

Several types of goods are exempt from being returned. Perishable goods such as food, flowers, newspapers or magazines cannot be returned. We also do not accept products that are intimate or sanitary goods, hazardous materials, or flammable liquids or gases.

Additional non-returnable items:

  • Gift cards
  • Downloadable software products
  • Some health and personal care items

To complete your return, we require a receipt or proof of purchase.

Please do not send your purchase back to the manufacturer.

There are certain situations where only partial refunds are granted:

  • Book with obvious signs of use
  • CD, DVD, VHS tape, software, video game, cassette tape, or vinyl record that has been opened.
  • Any item not in its original condition, is damaged or missing parts for reasons not due to our error.
  • Any item that is returned more than 30 days after delivery

Refunds

Once your return is received and inspected, we will send you an email to notify you that we have received your returned item. We will also notify you of the approval or rejection of your refund.

If you are approved, then your refund will be processed, and a credit will automatically be applied to your credit card or original method of payment, within a certain amount of days.

Late or missing refunds

If you havent received a refund yet, first check your bank account again.

Then contact your credit card company, it may take some time before your refund is officially posted.

Next contact your bank. There is often some processing time before a refund is posted.

If youve done all of this and you still have not received your refund yet, please contact us at {email address}.

Sale items

Only regular priced items may be refunded. Sale items cannot be refunded.

Exchanges

We only replace items if they are defective or damaged. If you need to exchange it for the same item, send us an email at {email address} and send your item to: {physical address}.

Gifts

If the item was marked as a gift when purchased and shipped directly to you, youll receive a gift credit for the value of your return. Once the returned item is received, a gift certificate will be mailed to you.

If the item wasnt marked as a gift when purchased, or the gift giver had the order shipped to themselves to give to you later, we will send a refund to the gift giver and they will find out about your return.

Shipping returns

To return your product, you should mail your product to: {physical address}.

You will be responsible for paying for your own shipping costs for returning your item. Shipping costs are non-refundable. If you receive a refund, the cost of return shipping will be deducted from your refund.

Depending on where you live, the time it may take for your exchanged product to reach you may vary.

If you are returning more expensive items, you may consider using a trackable shipping service or purchasing shipping insurance. We dont guarantee that we will receive your returned item.

Need help?

Contact us at {email} for questions related to refunds and returns.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
Welcome to Page Turners, your literary sanctuary in the digital world! Dive into a universe of words where every page holds a new adventure, a fresh perspective, and endless inspiration. Whether you're a seasoned bookworm or just beginning your reading journey, our shelves are brimming with treasures waiting to be discovered.
Explore our curated collection of bestsellers, classics, and hidden gems spanning every genre imaginable. From heart-pounding thrillers to heartwarming romances, from epic fantasies to thought-provoking non-fiction, there's something for every reader to delight in.
Join our vibrant community of book lovers who share their passion for literature through lively discussions, insightful reviews, and exclusive events. Connect with fellow bibliophiles, authors, and book enthusiasts from around the globe as we celebrate the magic of storytelling together.
At Page Turners, we believe that books have the power to transform lives, ignite imaginations, and bridge worlds. So, grab your favorite beverage, cozy up with a good book, and let the journey begin. Happy reading!

item.title: 8 Rules of love
item.dc:creator: Riel1240
item.content:encoded:
Introducing "8 Rules of Love" by Jay Shetty a profound guide to unlocking the secrets of love, happiness, and fulfillment. Drawing from ancient wisdom and modern insights, Jay Shetty takes readers on a transformative journey to discover the true essence of love and its profound impact on our lives.
In this captivating book, Jay Shetty distills eight timeless principles that serve as pillars for building deep, meaningful connections with ourselves and others. From cultivating compassion and practicing gratitude to embracing vulnerability and fostering forgiveness, each rule offers practical wisdom and actionable steps to navigate the complexities of love in all its forms.
Through poignant stories, relatable anecdotes, and powerful teachings, Jay Shetty empowers readers to transcend the limitations of fear, insecurity, and ego, and embrace love as the ultimate force for healing and growth. Whether you're seeking to enrich your relationships, find inner peace, or cultivate a greater sense of purpose, "8 Rules of Love" offers invaluable guidance to illuminate your path toward a life filled with love, joy, and abundance.
Join millions of readers worldwide who have been inspired by Jay Shetty's wisdom and compassion, and embark on a transformative journey to unleash the power of love in your life. "8 Rules of Love" is more than just a book it's a roadmap to living a life of profound meaning and fulfillment.
item.excerpt:encoded: "8 Rules of Love" by Jay Shetty is a transformative guidebook that unveils the timeless principles for fostering deep, meaningful connections in our lives. Through poignant stories and actionable insights, Shetty empowers readers to embrace love as a force for healing, growth, and fulfillment. Dive into this captivating read and discover the keys to unlocking a life filled with love, joy, and abundance.

item.title: Loose Head: Confessions of an (un)professional rugby player
item.dc:creator: Riel1240
item.content:encoded: "Loose Head: Confessions of an (un)professional Rugby Player" takes readers on an exhilarating journey into the heart of the rugby world through the eyes of a seasoned player who defies convention at every turn. In this gripping memoir, the author candidly shares the highs and lows of their unconventional career, offering a raw and unfiltered glimpse into the exhilarating yet often tumultuous world of professional rugby. With unapologetic honesty, the author recounts their experiences both on and off the field, from the adrenaline-fueled highs of victory to the crushing blows of defeat. From the gritty intensity of training sessions to the camaraderie forged in the locker room, readers are immersed in the unique culture and camaraderie that define the sport of rugby. But "Loose Head" goes beyond the game itself, delving into the personal struggles and triumphs that shape the author's journey. From navigating the pressures of competition to grappling with injuries and setbacks, this is a story of resilience, determination, and the unyielding passion that drives athletes to push their limits and defy expectations. Through exhilarating match-day anecdotes, behind-the-scenes revelations, and intimate reflections, "Loose Head" offers a captivating glimpse into the heart and soul of one of rugby's most enigmatic figures. Whether you're a die-hard rugby fan or simply drawn to compelling tales of triumph over adversity, this unforgettable memoir will leave you inspired, entertained, and eager for more. Strap in for an unforgettable ride with "Loose Head: Confessions of an (un)professional Rugby Player."
item.excerpt:encoded: The hilarious, unfiltered truth about being a rugby player - from the horsey's mouth. How to survive the force of 30 car crashes a game Whatnotto call Eddie Jones Exposing the secret naked wrestling scene The ludicrous player who bought a flash car he couldn't fit his twenty-stone behind into (er...that'll be me) This book is not just about how I got back on my horse and went clippity-clop all the way to the World Cup final in Japan. It's the story of how a fat kid who had to live up to the nickname Psycho grew up to play (and party) for over a decade with rugby's greatest pros. From melting opponents in tackles and propping up scrums, to losing blood, sweat and ears in the name of the great sport of rugby.

item.title: The 48 Laws of Power
item.dc:creator: Riel1240
item.content:encoded:
"The 48 Laws of Power" is a timeless and provocative guide to understanding the dynamics of power and influence in human interactions. Written by Robert Greene, this seminal work offers readers a comprehensive exploration of the strategies and tactics employed by history's most influential individuals to attain and maintain power.
Divided into 48 distinct laws, each backed by historical examples and anecdotes, this book provides invaluable insights into the often ruthless and Machiavellian nature of power dynamics. From mastering the art of manipulation to cultivating an aura of mystique, Greene's laws offer a roadmap for navigating the complex terrain of social and professional interactions.
Drawing from a rich tapestry of historical figures, from statesmen and conquerors to artists and philosophers, "The 48 Laws of Power" reveals the underlying principles that govern human behavior and shape the course of history. Whether you aspire to ascend the ranks of power or simply seek to understand the forces at play in your everyday interactions, Greene's masterful blend of psychology, history, and philosophy provides a compelling and thought-provoking exploration of the dynamics of power.
With its incisive analysis and practical advice, "The 48 Laws of Power" has garnered a cult following among readers seeking to enhance their personal and professional effectiveness. Whether viewed as a Machiavellian handbook or a cautionary tale, this book challenges readers to confront the realities of power and offers invaluable lessons for navigating the complexities of the modern world.
item.excerpt:encoded: Some laws teach the need for prudence (Law 1: Never Outshine the Master), others teach the value of confidence (Law 28: Enter Action with Boldness), and many recommend absolute self-preservation (Law 15: Crush Your Enemy Totally). Every law, though, has one thing in common: an interest in total domination. In a bold and arresting two-color package,The 48 Laws of Poweris ideal whether your aim is conquest, self-defense, or simply to understand the rules of the game.

item.title: The Mamba Mentality: How I Play
item.dc:creator: Riel1240
item.content:encoded: "The Mamba Mentality: How I Play" is a captivating journey into the mind of one of basketball's most iconic figures, Kobe Bryant. In this illuminating book, Bryant shares the philosophy and mindset that propelled him to legendary status on the court, offering readers a rare glimpse into the inner workings of his relentless pursuit of greatness. Drawing from his illustrious career spanning two decades in the NBA, Bryant delves deep into the principles and practices that shaped his approach to the game. From his unwavering work ethic to his insatiable hunger for success, Bryant reveals the mindset and habits that enabled him to dominate his opponents and cement his legacy as one of the greatest players of all time. Through a series of personal anecdotes, reflections, and insights, Bryant distills the essence of his "Mamba Mentality" a mindset characterized by unparalleled focus, determination, and resilience. Whether discussing the nuances of footwork, the importance of mental preparation, or the value of teamwork, Bryant's wisdom transcends the realm of basketball, offering timeless lessons for achieving excellence in any endeavor. But "The Mamba Mentality" is more than just a playbook for success on the court. It's a testament to the power of discipline, passion, and self-belief to overcome obstacles and achieve greatness. Through his words, Bryant inspires readers to embrace challenges, push past their limits, and strive for excellence in everything they do. With its blend of personal anecdotes, practical advice, and profound insights, "The Mamba Mentality: How I Play" is a must-read for athletes, aspiring professionals, and anyone seeking to unlock their full potential. Whether you're a fan of basketball or simply drawn to stories of perseverance and triumph, Bryant's words will resonate long after the final buzzer.
item.excerpt:encoded: The Mamba Mentality: How I Playis Kobe Bryants personal perspective of his life and career on the basketball court and his exceptional, insightful style of playing the gamea fitting legacy from the late Los Angeles Laker superstar.
